attributes.action: Discuss Priti Patel MP to resign over secret meetings in Israel.
attributes.additional_details: Priti Patel has conducted official meetings with Israel without consent and has lied to cover up meetings. It is unacceptable for a cabient member to undertake such meetings without official government backing and continue to lie a out her conduct.
attributes.background: Priti Patel has blatantly lied and deserves to be held accountable. It is unacceptable for a cabinet member to lie.

rejection.details: As you probably know, Priti Patel has already resigned from the Government.
